product_name: The North Face Agility Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Stretchy, breathable fabric and a soft liner makeThe North Face Agility Shorts ready for the trail whenever you are. Stretch-mesh panels are placed to increase ventilation in high-heat areas. Crepe liner feels soft against skin. Embedded silver salts fight odors. The North Face Agility Shorts feature an elasticized waist with drawcord, reflective highlights, 2 hand pockets and a zippered stash pocket. Closeout.
short_description: Stretchy, breathable fabric and a soft liner makeThe North Face Agility Shorts ready for the trail whenever you are.
